title: Japan Jan factory output likely fell for 2nd month on hit from Omicron
description: Japan's industrial output likely fell for a second month in January as the fast spread of the Omicron COVID-19 variant disrupted car production, a Reuters poll showed.
content:
TOKYO, Feb 25 (Reuters) - Japan's industrial output likely fell for a second month in January as the fast spread of the Omicron COVID-19 variant disrupted car production, a Reuters poll showed.
